instruction: Illustrate how to make a chocolate sundae.
output: Start by dishing out 2 scoops of chocolate ice cream in a bowl. Drizzle your chocolate sauce on top and around the sides of the bowl. Place chocolate chips and sprinkles over the ice cream. Then add crushed nuts and some chocolate chips to the sides. Finally top it off with whipped cream, more chocolate sauce, and a cherry for decoration. Your delicious chocolate sundae is now ready to be served!
